You missed a big OOC flame war about the US VS Canada. If you start
participating in it right now, I will hurt you :-)

Anyways, Killfest is just talking with DrillBit. I don't think
anything else happened with your other chars.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Jeesh I spend the night at a friends house and come back to
like 4 > pages of posts on yahoogroups. I dont have time to read
every post, I > only looked for topics I was in already. Anyway could
someone fill me > in?
